text: Shinja-tachi wa, shinja o sashioite fushinjin'na mono o shinmitsuna tomo to shite wa naranai. Kore o aete suru mono wa, arrā kara (no tasuke) wa mattaku naidearou. Daga kare-ra ga (fushin-sha) kara (no kigai o) osorete, sono mi o mamoru baai wa betsudearu. Arrā wa o jishin o (nomi nenjiru yō) anata gata ni ron sa reru. Hontōni arrā no omoto ni,(saigo no) kaeri-sho wa aru
